Uses of Package
com.samskivert.servlet

Packages that use com.samskivert.servlet
com.samskivert.servlet Provides services and patterns that are useful in developing web applications. 
com.samskivert.servlet.user Provides services for managing a database of users in a web application or suite of web applications. 
com.samskivert.velocity Provides parts of a simple web application framework built around the Velocity template engine. 
 

Classes in com.samskivert.servlet used by com.samskivert.servlet
Site
          Represents a site mapping known to a SiteIdentifier.
SiteIdentifier
          Responsible for determining the unique site identifier based on information available in the HTTP request.
SiteResourceLoader
          Web applications may wish to load resources in such a way that the site on which they are running is allowed to override a resource with a site-specific version (a header, footer or navigation template for example).
 

Classes in com.samskivert.servlet used by com.samskivert.servlet.user
RedirectException
          A redirect exception is thrown by servlet services when they require that the user be redirected to a different URL rather than continue processing this request.
 

Classes in com.samskivert.servlet used by com.samskivert.velocity
MessageManager
          The message manager handles the translation messages for a web application.
SiteIdentifier
          Responsible for determining the unique site identifier based on information available in the HTTP request.
SiteResourceLoader
          Web applications may wish to load resources in such a way that the site on which they are running is allowed to override a resource with a site-specific version (a header, footer or navigation template for example).
